description:
👽 PREDATOR: BADLANDS
🔥Witness the final fight between Dek and his father Njohrr in PREDATOR: BADLANDS (2025) — the explosive climax where bloodlines collide and legends are born. 🔥
This 4K battle scene showcases intense choreography, brutal Predator combat, and the emotional confrontation between a son forging his destiny and a father consumed by power.

🌵 Film Overview:
Set in a near-future dystopian desert region plagued by war and lawlessness, Predator: Badlands follows a rogue military unit and a band of survivors who stumble upon an ancient Predator hunting ground. But these aren’t the hunters we remember — they’ve evolved… and they’re not alone.

description:
Reality fractures once again.
In CONTROL: RESONANT (2026), the world of shifting architecture, paranormal forces, and psychological horror returns in this reveal trailer showcased at The Game Awards. Familiar yet transformed, the Bureau’s influence spreads deeper as unseen powers resonate beyond control.

This cinematic 4K scene teases haunting environments, reality-warping visuals, and the signature atmosphere fans expect from the Control universe.
